mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.admin_url AS "adminUrl", a.user_name AS "userName", a.password AS "password", a.hotel_id AS "hotel.id", a.contacts AS "contacts", a.contacts_phone AS "contactsPhone", a.contract_period AS "contractPeriod", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_channel( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, admin_url, user_name, password, hotel_id, contacts, contacts_phone, contract_period, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{adminUrl}, #{hotel.id}, #{contacts}, #{contactsPhone}, #{contractPeriod}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hotel_channel SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, admin_url = #{adminUrl}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, hotel_id = #{hotel.id}, contacts = #{contacts}, contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone}, contract_period = #{contractPeriod}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
